sentences.sentence: The First Lady unveiled a commemorative plaque.
sentences.translation: 第一夫人为纪念牌匾揭了幕。

sentences.sentence: A commemorative stamp will be issued October 15.
sentences.translation: 一枚纪念邮票将于10月15日发行。

sentences.sentence: The new commemorative stamps will be put on sale next week.
sentences.translation: 新的纪念邮票将于下星期发售。
